title: Prepaid Cards and a $10 riot card giveaway

replies.body:
Hey Venom101,

If the card was not activated, contact the merchant where you purchased the card so they can do so. For more information submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753224-Prepaid-RP-Cards-NA-OCE-

-DTN
thanks DTN but whats a merchant?
The store you purchased the card from, in this case EB Games.

You bring them the card and the receipt (Hopefully you kept this, if not then it's possible they can look the transaction up although I'm not certain about this) and tell them it wasn't activated correctly.

Simple as that really.
